miniapp.name: Emoji Chat
miniapp.subtitle: Web3 emoji-only chat app
miniapp.description: A Web3 chat application where communication happens exclusively through emojis. Create custom emojis, mint them as NFTs, and trade them on the marketplace.
miniapp.tagline: Chat with emojis, mint as NFTs
miniapp.ogTitle: Emoji Chat - Web3 Emoji Chat App
miniapp.ogDescription: Create, collect, and chat with emoji NFTs on Base
